duties: Migrated media assets and copy content from existing site over to React project.
Wrote detailed story tickets with clear AC and code reviewed PRs on GitHub.
Utilized Github branches to organize and merge new features deployed in production.
Followed design doc to develop email used in email blast sent to thousands of customers.
Wrote helper functions with Jest unit tests to convert data used on frontend interface.
Configured React router to handle routes and URL parameters used for application logic.
Refactored page components and located/migrated shared component logic.
Worked with frontend development team using Github to manage codebase.
Collaborated with frontend team to develop CRUD dashboard used by client to manage site.
Helped integrate Firebase realtime database into dashboard to handle client data.
Develop a login page using React and Firebase Auth to authenticate/signup users.
Wrote Firebase rules to validate and sanitize user inputs being sent in API requests.

projects.name: Pantry
projects.description: Digital grocery list that allows users to add, remove, and organize food items, using React.
